revised_title: Trypanosome Diseases of Domestic Animals in Uganda: Trypanosoma Pecorum
tldr: The authors investigate the prevalence and impact of trypanosome diseases, specifically Trypanosoma Pecorum, on domestic animals in Uganda. They describe the morphology and characteristics of the trypanosome and discuss its impact on cattle, goats, sheep, monkeys, dogs, rats, and mice, while also noting that guinea pigs are refractory to the disease.
